# iosxe_l2vpn_evpn_profile (Data Source)

This data source can read the L2VPN EVPN Profile configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_l2vpn_evpn_profile" "example" {
  name = "MY_EVPN_PROFILE"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) EVPN L2 profile name

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `evi_base` (Number) Evpn instance identifier base
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `l2vni_base` (Number) VxLAN Layer 2 VNI base
